Uses of Interface
oaidtb.boosters.IterativeUpdatableClassifier

Uses of IterativeUpdatableClassifier in oaidtb.boosters
 

Classes in oaidtb.boosters that implement IterativeUpdatableClassifier
 class AdaBoostECC
          Class for boosting using AdaBoostECC.
 class AdaBoostM1
          Class for boosting using AdaBoostM1.
 class AdaBoostM1W
          A modification of AdaBoostM1 which works better with weak base classifiers; for more information see: [1] - Günther Eibl & Karl Peter Pfeiffer How to make AdaBoost.M1 work for weak base classifiers by changing only one line of the code.
 class AdaBoostMH
          Class for boosting using Schapire & Singer's AdaBoostMH.
 class AdaBoostOC
          Class for boosting using Schapire's AdaBoostOC.
 class Booster
          Abstract class defining the structure ("iterative & interactive") and common options to our boosting implementations.
 class GentleAdaBoost
          Class for boosting using GentleAdaBoost.
 class RealAdaBoost
          Class for boosting using RealAdaBoost; it uses class probability estimates (so it needs a DistributionClassifier as base classifier) to construct real valued contributions of each base classifier.
 

Uses of IterativeUpdatableClassifier in oaidtb.boosters.costSensitive
 

Classes in oaidtb.boosters.costSensitive that implement IterativeUpdatableClassifier
 class AbstractCSB
          Abstract class for the cost sensitive boosters.
 class AdaCost
          An implementation of AdaCost; for more information, see: Fan, Stolfo, Zhang & Chan, AdaCost: Misclassification cost-sensitive boosting..
 class AdaCostB1
          One of the small changes proposed for AdaCost in: Ting, K.M., A Comparative Study of Cost-Sensitive Boosting Algorithms..
 class AdaCostB2
          One of the small changes proposed for AdaCost in: Ting, K.M., A Comparative Study of Cost-Sensitive Boosting Algorithms..
 class CSAdaBoostMH
          A class that implements a modification of AdaBoostMH for cost sensitive classification; it uses an AbstractCSB booster to construct an hypothesis for each class, providing it with a 2x2 cost matrix where the element (0,1) is the cost of misclassifying any other class as that class and the element (1,0) is the cost of misclassifying that class as any other class.
 class CSB0
          One of the variants of CSB proposed in: Ting, K.M., A Comparative Study of Cost-Sensitive Boosting Algorithms..
 class CSB1
          One of the variants of CSB proposed in: Ting, K.M., A Comparative Study of Cost-Sensitive Boosting Algorithms..
 class CSB2
          One of the variants of CSB proposed in: Ting, K.M., A Comparative Study of Cost-Sensitive Boosting Algorithms..

          Una referencia al clasificador actual como booster

private  void VisualOptionsPanel.createHypothesisSumImage(IterativeUpdatableClassifier classifier)
          Método que permite crear una imagen que represente la hipótesis de un clasificador sobre el panel de dibujado; la construimos creando una rejilla (utilizando la configuración de esta) en la que cada celda será pintada del color que el clasificador predizca para su punto intermedio.
 void ClassifierPanel.BoosterPanel.setBooster(IterativeUpdatableClassifier booster)
